entry.title: keshavsharma5118/photo-extractor-frontend: The Student Photo Extractor is a lightweight tool designed to fetch student photos directly from the GIET University ERP system using a structured URL pattern. By providing the roll number, the tool generates the appropriate link and retrieves the corresponding photo in real-time.
entry.content: The Student Photo Extractor is a lightweight tool designed to fetch student photos directly from the GIET University ERP system using a structured URL pattern. By providing the roll number, the tool generates the appropriate link and retrieves the corresponding photo in real-time.

entry.title: Arpit-Khanulia/Terminal_Portfolio: The Terminal Portfolio project is an interactive and text-based application that provides information about me, It is built using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, giving it a lightweight and accessible interface.
